title: Patterns and drivers of maternal personal exposure to PM2.5 in informal settlements in Nairobi, Kenya
content:

There is very limited data on personal exposure to fine particulate matter (PM2.5) for mothers in informal settlements in Africa. Identifying and characterizing the sources of exposure to PM2.5 for...
